name: Influence (itch) (KittenFuzzArt)
description:
The world is under constant threat and in desperate need of a hero.  But so far, none have risen.  Small bands of fighters have attempted to lead a resistance, but their efforts are falling short of what the world truly needs: someone with the will of a hero, who can lead the entire world to salvation.

You live in a small mountain town, isolated from most of the world, just trying to get by and keep hope for better days.  Will the hero the world needs come from such a small town?  Or will the world only fall further into darkness?  The choice is yours.

Game Made for Ludum Dare 46

Game and Custom Art by KittenFuzzArt

Custom Music by PlantainTrip
